summary: Implemented all 4 TODO items: 1) Discount calculation with coupon and package support, 2) Gift card redemption adding amount to wallet, 3) Subscription payment gateway integration with hooks, 4) Availability score calculation based on available slots in next 7 days. Also added pending status migration for subscriptions and payment hooks for both booking and subscription.
current_status: Completed all TODO implementations. Now verifying revenue models and other features from the plan.
